channel.title: Server background
channel.description: Can anyone help me, all those tutorials tell you to go to sprites and just edit it.. but my client side doesn't have a sprite folder or an background to edit.. How else can i change my background?

item.title: Server background
item.dc:creator: @Not_Botting Not Botting
item.description:
@Not_Botting wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:7, topic:525703”][quote author=Not Botting link=topic=644443.msg4336812#msg4336812 date=1374509759]

It does have a sprites folder you dilly.
Otherwise you wouldn’t have your server working.

You know how I made your server dload the cache, well go to c:/ cache sprit folders in there

Not all server’s have sprite folders. base servers with nothing added to them can only have data and map folders and the rest are .dat files. Ever open up a 500+ cache? it’s all .dat files.

OT: use tom’s cache editor to open your cache and edit images.
[/quote]

I knew he had a sprites folder. Otherwise I wouldn’t of said anything[/quote]

does have a sprites folder you dilly. [b]Otherwise you wouldn't have your server working[/b].

incorrect.

Read full topic
